extends ProjectResources<FileShareRestRep>

    File Systems resources.

    Base URL: /file/filesystems

        API Call: POST /file/filesystems?project={projectId}

        Parameters:

        input - the file system configuration.

      • removeExport

        public Task<FileShareRestRep> removeExport(java.net.URI id,
                                  java.lang.String protocol,
                                  java.lang.String securityType,
                                  java.lang.String permissions,
                                  java.lang.String rootUserMapping)
        Removes an export from the given file system by ID.

        API Call: DELETE /file/filesystems/{id}/exports/{protocol},{securityType},{permissions},{rootUserMapping}

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the file system.
        protocol - the protocol of the export.
        securityType - the security type of the export.
        permissions - the permissions of the export.
        rootUserMapping - the root user mapping of the export.
        Returns:
        a task for monitoring the progress of the operation.

      • removeExport

                                  java.lang.String subDirectory)
        Removes an export from the given file system by ID.

        API Call: DELETE /file/filesystems/{id}/exports/{protocol},{securityType},{permissions},{rootUserMapping}?subDirectory={subDirectory}

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the file system.
        protocol - the protocol of the export.
        securityType - the security type of the export.
        permissions - the permissions of the export.
        rootUserMapping - the root user mapping of the export.
        subDirectory - the sub directory of the export.

        a task for monitoring the progress of the operation.
